mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT C.CHATROOM_NO , CHATCONTENT_NO , CHAT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') "SEND_DATE" , TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'HH24:MM') "SEND_TIME" , CHAT_TITLE , (SELECT PROFILE_URL FROM TB_CHATMEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo} AND CHATROOM_NO = C.CHATROOM_NO) "PROFILE_URL" , (SELECT NOT_READ FROM TB_CHATMEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CHATROOM_NO = C.CHATROOM_NO) "NOT_READ" FROM TB_CHATCONTENT C JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (WRITER_NO = MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_CHATMEMBER CHM ON (C.CHATROOM_NO = CHM.CHATROOM_NO) JOIN TB_CHATROOM R ON (C.CHATROOM_NO = R.CHATROOM_NO) WHERE C.CHATROOM_NO IN (SELECT CHATROOM_NO FROM TB_CHATMEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AND (C.CHATROOM_NO, SEND_DATE) IN (SELECT CHATROOM_NO , MAX(SEND_DATE) FROM TB_CHATCONTENT GROUP BY CHATROOM_NO) ORDER BY CHATCONTENT_NO DESC

select chatcontent_no , writer_no , name "writer_name" , dept_name , job_name , profile_url , chat_content , origin_name , change_name , TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') "SEND_DATE" , TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'HH24:MM') "SEND_TIME" from tb_chatcontent join tb_member on (member_no = writer_no) where chatroom_no = #{roomNo} order by chatcontent_no

select name "writer_name" , writer_no , dept_name , job_name , profile_url , chat_content , TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') "SEND_DATE" , TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'HH24:MM') "SEND_TIME" from tb_chatcontent join tb_member on (writer_no = member_no) where chatcontent_no = #{contentNo}
